0.3.2.name: wordpress/get-my-tweets
0.3.2.description: Using PHP 5 and XMLReader, this plugin will load a user definable number of Tweets from Twitter. It requires that the Twitter user name be supplied to the plugin, and the desired number of Tweets to retrieve. It also requires that user's Twitter timeline be "public" to be able to be parsed and read. The plugin will parse links within Tweets.
